Persona: Alex

Background:
Alex is a 22-year-old recent college graduate who has just completed his studies in Environmental Science. He is passionate about sustainability and seeks to make an impact in the field of renewable energy. Despite his academic achievements, Alex has not yet secured a job, leading to his current zero income level. He actively applies for internships and entry-level positions in the hope of starting his career.

Demographics:

Age: 22  
Gender: Male  
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Science  
Profession: Recent College Graduate (Job Seeker)  
Income: $0 (currently unemployed)

Financial Situation:
Having no income, Alex relies on savings from his part-time job during college and support from his family while he seeks employment. He is careful with his finances and prioritizes essential expenses, often seeking student discounts and budget-friendly options.

Shopping Habits:
Alex is frugal and strategic in his shopping habits. He prefers to buy second-hand or thrifted items and frequently utilizes online marketplaces. He values quality over quantity and is keen on eco-friendly products, looking for brands that align with his sustainability values. Alex often seeks out sales and discounts, aiming to stretch his limited budget.

Professional Life:
Currently, Alex spends his time applying for jobs, networking in the sustainability community, and continually learning through online courses and webinars related to his field. He volunteers with local environmental organizations, hoping to gain experience while making professional connections. 

Personal Style:
Alex embraces a casual, eco-conscious style. He prefers comfortable, versatile clothing such as jeans, graphic tees featuring environmental messages, and sustainable brands. He favors earth tones and natural fabrics, appreciating simplicity and functionality.

Lifestyle:
Alex lives in a shared apartment with friends to reduce living costs. He enjoys outdoor activities like hiking and cycling, and often participates in community clean-up events. He typically wakes up around 8 AM, dedicating his mornings to job searching and learning before spending afternoons volunteering or enjoying nature.

Overall, Alex is eager to launch his career in environmental science, focused on finding meaningful work that aligns with his values, all while managing the challenges of being unemployed.
